Token.Abstract: A UIFont class extension that adds an API for performing common string measurement tasks.
Calculates the size of the bounding rectangle required to draw a given text string in the font represented by the receiver.

Parameter.Name: str
Parameter.Abstract: The text string to measure.

Parameter.Name: maxWidth
Parameter.Abstract: The maximum width allowed for the text. If str would not fit within maxWidth on a single line, it will be wrapped according to the line break mode NSLineBreakByWordWrapping.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The size required to draw the text string, with the width and height components rounded up to the nearest integer (whole-pixel) value.

Token.Abstract: Calculates the size of the bounding rectangle required to draw a given text string in the font represented by the receiver.

Parameter.Name: str
Parameter.Abstract: The text string to measure.

Parameter.Name: maxWidth
Parameter.Abstract: The maximum width allowed for the text. If str would not fit within maxWidth on a single line, it will be wrapped according to the line break mode NSLineBreakByWordWrapping.

Parameter.Name: maxHeight
Parameter.Abstract: The maximum height allowed for the text.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The size required to draw the text string, with the width and height components rounded up to the nearest integer (whole-pixel) value.

Token.Abstract: Calculates the size of the bounding rectangle required to draw a given text string in the font represented by the receiver.

Parameter.Name: str
Parameter.Abstract: The text string to measure.

Parameter.Name: maxSize
Parameter.Abstract: The maximum size allowed for the text. If str would not fit within maxSize.width on a single line, it will be wrapped according to the line break mode NSLineBreakByWordWrapping.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The size required to draw the text string, with the width and height components rounded up to the nearest integer (whole-pixel) value.

Token.Abstract: Calculates the size of the bounding rectangle required to draw a given text string in the font represented by the receiver.

Parameter.Name: str
Parameter.Abstract: The text string to measure.

Parameter.Name: maxWidth
Parameter.Abstract: The maximum width allowed for the text. If str would not fit within maxWidth on a single line, it will be wrapped according to the line break mode NSLineBreakByWordWrapping.

Parameter.Name: allowFractionalSize
Parameter.Abstract: If YES, the returned size may contain fractional (sub-pixel) values. If NO, the width and height components rounded up to the nearest integer (whole-pixel) value.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The size required to draw the text string.

Token.Abstract: Calculates the size of the bounding rectangle required to draw a given text string in the font represented by the receiver.

Parameter.Abstract: The text string to measure.

Parameter.Name: maxWidth

Parameter.Name: maxHeight
Parameter.Abstract: The maximum height allowed for the text.

Parameter.Name: allowFractionalSize
Parameter.Abstract: If YES, the returned size may contain fractional (sub-pixel) values. If NO, the width and height components rounded up to the nearest integer (whole-pixel) value.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The size required to draw the text string.

Token.Abstract: Calculates the size of the bounding rectangle required to draw a given text string in the font represented by the receiver.

Parameter.Name: str
Parameter.Abstract: The text string to measure.

Parameter.Name: maxSize
Parameter.Abstract: The maximum size allowed for the text. If str would not fit within maxSize.width on a single line, it will be wrapped according to the line break mode NSLineBreakByWordWrapping.

Parameter.Name: allowFractionalSize
Parameter.Abstract: If YES, the returned size may contain fractional (sub-pixel) values. If NO, the width and height components rounded up to the nearest integer (whole-pixel) value.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The size required to draw the text string.

Token.Abstract: Calculates the size of the bounding rectangle required to draw a given text string in the font represented by the receiver.

Parameter.Name: str
Parameter.Abstract: The text string to measure.

Parameter.Name: maxWidth
Parameter.Abstract: The maximum width allowed for the text. If str would not fit within maxWidth on a single line, it may be wrapped according to the specified line break mode.

Parameter.Name: lineMode
Parameter.Abstract: The line break mode to use for measuring the text.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The size required to draw the text string, with the width and height components rounded up to the nearest integer (whole-pixel) value.

Parameter.Name: lineMode
Parameter.Abstract: The line break mode to use for measuring the text.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The size required to draw the text string, with the width and height components rounded up to the nearest integer (whole-pixel) value.
